solution_line_template: He read {pages_per_day} pages every day for {days_read} days for a total of {pages_per_day}*{days_read} = <<{pages_per_day}*{days_read}={total_pages_read}>>{total_pages_read} pages
Therefore the total number of pages is {total_pages_read}*{inverse_fraction_covered} = <<{total_pages_read}*{inverse_fraction_covered}={total_book_pages}>>{total_book_pages} pages
